description: Power your pursuit of perfection in a range truly designed for you. Oversized fits created specifically for that distinct bodybuilder shape and durable fabrics to support you through even your most brutal workouts, day after day. A new washed fabric meets our signature bold Power branding, giving you a look that’s just as comfortable in the gym as it is on the streets.

reviews.reviewContent: It’s a perfect fit for me, very comfortable. Runs just a bit small so size up if you need to. I’m 5’ 10” 175lbs and have a medium. People definitely noticed at the gym…

description: A piece you can pair with anything doesn’t have to be boring. That’s where your Fraction look steps in.
